name: alpine hat
notes:
a holiday hat full of cheer and joy. a fun project that uses one hank of woolstok and one mini hank of woolstok for each stripe. a color palette ideal for both men and women.

featuring the holiday cheer mini hank bundle.

experience level

* advanced beginner

materials

* woolstok (100% fine highland wool; 50g/123yds): 1 hank
* woolstok bundle (100% fine highland wool; 5g/12 yds): 21 mini hanks
* size 6 (4mm) 16” circular needle, or size to obtain gauge
* size 7 (4.5mm) 16” circular needle, or size to obtain gauge
* size 7 (4.5mm) double pointed needles, or size to obtain gauge

finished measurements 

* circumference: 19”
* height: 9”

color shown

* gravel road no. 1302
* wild thyme no. 1306
* red rock no. 1315
* cast iron no. 1300
* earth ivy no. 1309
* cranberry compote no. 1310
* highland fleece no. 1303
* storm cloud no. 1301
